Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add Phase I specification \(CLI todo app\)

Complete SDD specification for Phase I: In-Memory Python Console Todo App.

Key elements:
- 4 prioritized user stories \(P1: core CRUD, P2: filtering, P3: scheduling, P4: session tracking\)
- 27 functional requirements covering data model, operations, UX, session tracking, constraints
- 7 measurable success criteria \(user launch time, data model enforcement, operation independence, filtering, error handling, clean exit, timestamp preservation\)
- 8 edge cases documented
- 9 assumptions \(single-user, in-memory, Python 3.13+, terminal I/O, date flexibility, defaults, no external APIs, error re-prompting, backward compat\)
- 8 non-goals \(persistence, web UI, AI, integrations deferred to later phases\)
- Complete acceptance testing strategy \(unit, integration, manual\)
- Future phase compatibility notes \(Phase II web API, Phase III AI, Phase IV/V cloud\)

Specification Quality Checklist: PASS \(all 18 criteria verified\)
Data model: canonical and immutable across all 5 phases
Technology constraints: Python 3.13+, Standard Library only, stdin/stdout/stderr, single-threaded, in-memory

Ready for `/sp.plan` architecture design and `/sp.tasks` development task generation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
